name: Amos' Bow
title: Strong-Willed: Amos' Bow
desc: "I dreamt of ocean waves and sand, of lush forests and land."\n"I dreamt of boars playing in berry bushes, of a towering spire."
in_play_description: The character deals +1 DMG. When the character uses a Skill that costs at least a total of 5 Elemental Dice and Energy, +2 additional DMG. (Once per Round)

skills.desc: The character deals +1 DMG. When the character uses a Skill that costs at least a total of 5 Elemental Dice and Energy, +2 additional DMG. (Once per Round) (Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
